vsParam:
Hehe. I've gotten used to walking.
What a fresh experience as I was living in the ocean. Very fresh ♪

Hehe. Amaryllis, you're having a good time.
But I'm actually quite surprised...

Yeah... You suddenly came to the Academy and you're
walking... But...

Because I want to show you guys as early as possible!
Look! I have grown feet!

It would be a loss if I don't show this charming
body to various types of people, wouldn't it?

Ah. Ahhhhhhh. Feet! You have feet...
So scary...
It seems that the effect is quite obvious...

Ah. Just ignore Cresson. He's an idiot...
Hmm. Amaryllis.

How did you manage to grow human feet...?
I've never heard of it...

Ah. I'm curious about it too.
Can you tell me...?

Hehe. Do you want to know~? Do you really want to know?
If I tell you~ You must keep it a secret~

OK. Now I feel like I must tell you.
Here comes the answer!

Yes. Mr. Rod found it.
This is the "drug that can make mermaids walk"!

I see...
This is pretty powerful...

Yes. This drug has been very famous
among mermaids!

Every young mermaid has the dream of setting foot on land.
So this is the drug that we've all longed for!

Uh...!
The drug you've all longed for...?

Exactly!
But I heard that this is a very precious and rare drug.

So I must thank Mr. Rod
for getting it for me!

Yes! You guys have been taking care of me too...
So let me help you in the rest of your journey.

Although I look like this, I can still fight.
You can count on me!

Wow. Thank you, Amaryllis!
Let's go on adventures together!

Alright. I like all interesting and joyful things!
[px]! Let's keep helping each other ♪
